problem.markdown: In the saturation table of a fluid, at some temperature, we have [mathjaxinline]h_{fg}=938.9[/mathjaxinline] kJ/kg and [mathjaxinline]s_{fg}=2.736[/mathjaxinline] kJ/kgK. What is the saturation temperature at that state is deg C? = 70 +- 3
problem.p: In the saturation table of a fluid, at some temperature, we have [mathjaxinline]h_{fg}=938.9[/mathjaxinline] kJ/kg and [mathjaxinline]s_{fg}=2.736[/mathjaxinline] kJ/kgK. What is the saturation temperature at that state is deg C?
